title: Pirate Staff
summaries: The Pirate Staff is a Hardmode summon weapon that spawns a Pirate minion, which attacks nearby enemies by pursuing and leaping onto the closest target while slashing at them with a small sword. Pirate minions attack enemies at a rate of once every 0.3 seconds per damaged enemy and trigger static immunity frames. Like other minions, the summoned Pirate is invincible and follows the player for an unlimited amount of time, unless the player dies, summons a replacement minion, cancels the buff, or leaves the world.

The Pirate Staff has a (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 0.1*1/1000 (0.1%) / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 0.05*1/2000 (0.05%) chance to be dropped by regular pirates (except Parrots) during the Pirate Invasion event. The Pirate Staff has an increased (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 0.4*1/250 (0.4%) / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 0.2*1/500 (0.2%) chance to be dropped from Pirate Captains, and a higher (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 6.67*1/15 (6.67%) / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 1*1/100 (1%) chance to be dropped by the Flying Dutchman(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions).

Its best modifier is Ruthless. The Mythical modifier provides the widest array of stat bonuses, but these primarily affect the initial summon rather than the resulting minion. Additionally, minions cannot deal critical hits. The only lasting advantage a Mythical Pirate Staff has over a Ruthless one is knockback.
